mapper.delete: delete from SYS_USERROLE where userid=#{id} and roleid=#{role.id}
update SYS_MYPAN set DEL_FLAG='1' where id=#{ID}
update APP_PAN_FILE set ISDEL='1' where id=#{ID}
update APP_PAN_FILE set isdel='1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.value from SYS_PERMISION_MAP t where t.name=#{key}

SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent_name" FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role_r r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_userrole ur ON ur.roleid = r.id JOIN APP_USER u ON u.userid = ur.userid AND u.userid = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent_name" FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id WHERE a.id=#{id} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, permission, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )

INSERT INTO sys_role_r( id, name, enname, role_type, data_scope, remarks, del_flag, is_sys, useable ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{roleType}, #{dataScope}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysData}, #{useable} )

INSERT INTO sys_role_menu(role_id, menu_id)
SELECT #{id}, #{menu.id} from dual

INSERT INTO sys_role_menu(role_id, menu_id)
SELECT #{id}, #{menu.id} from dual
insert into SYS_OFFICE(parent_id,name,code,type) values(#{DEPTID},'单位补充指标',#{CODE}||'03','2')
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role_r SET name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, role_type = #{roleType}, data_scope = #{dataScope}, remarks = #{remarks}, is_sys = #{sysData}, useable = #{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
update SYS_MYPAN set name=#{NAME} where id=#{ID}

insert into APP_PAN_FILE (NAME, SCR, PATH, XMH, XMLB, REMARKS, XMID, XMMC, FSIZE, ISDEL, TYPE, MLIDM) values(#{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SCR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PATH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMLB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMARKS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FSIZE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', '4', #{MLIDM,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

merge into sys_office a using (#{ID} id,#{PARENT_ID} PARENT_ID,#{NAME} NAME,#{REMARKS} REMARKS,'5' TYPE) b on (a.id=b.id and a.type=b.type) when not matched then insert (id,parent_id,name,remarks,useable,del_flag,type) values (sys_guid(),b.parent_id,b.name,b.remarks,'1','0','5') when matched then update set a.parent_id=b.parent_id,a.name=b.name,a.remarks=b.remarks
update sys_office set del_flag='1' where id=#{ID} and type='5'

insert into APP_PAN_FILE (NAME, SCR, MLID, PATH, XMH, XMLB, REMARKS, XMID, XMMC, FSIZE, ISDEL, TYPE) values(#{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SCR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MLID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PATH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMLB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMARKS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XMMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FSIZE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', '5')
update APP_PAN_FILE set ISDEL='1' where id=#{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.office_id AS "office.id", a.name, a.enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, o.name AS "office.name", o.code, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM SYS_ROLE_R a LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY o.code, a.name

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData, rm.menu_id AS "menuList.id" FROM sys_role_r a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.office_id AS "office.id", a.name, a.enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, o.name AS "office.name", o.code, a.useable AS useable, a.is_sys AS sysData FROM sys_role_r a JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.office_id WHERE a.name = #{name} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
select * from app_dept

select a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, decode(a.type,1,1,'') as typpe, decode(a.type,2,2,'') as typppe, decode(a.type,3,3,'') as typpppe, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.master, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, p.name AS parent_name FROM sys_office a LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id where a.del_flag!=1 and a.type!=4

select a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, decode(a.type,1,1,'') as typpe, decode(a.type,2,2,'') as typppe, decode(a.type,3,3,'') as typpppe, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.master, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, p.name AS parent_name FROM sys_office a LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
select * from SYS_MENU where id in (select menu_id from sys_role_menu where role_id=#{id})
select * from app_user where userid in (select userid from SYS_USERROLE where roleid=#{id})

select a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.code, decode(a.code,'9999','1','') as typpe, decode(a.code,'9999','','1') as typppe, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.master, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, p.name AS parent_name FROM sys_office a LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id where nvl(a.del_flag,'0') != '1' and a.type=4

select * from (select a.*, decode(a.type, 1, 1, '') as typpe, decode(a.type, 2, 2, '') as typppe, decode(a.type, 3, 3, '') as typpppe, decode(a.type, 5, 5, '') as typppppe, connect_by_isleaf isleaf from v_office a connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = #{dwdm}) where nvl(del_flag,'0') != '1' and type!=4 order by type desc

select * from (select a.*, decode(a.type, 1, 1, '') as typpe, decode(a.type, 2, 2, '') as typppe, decode(a.type, 3, 3, '') as typpppe, decode(a.type, 5, 5, '') as typppppe, connect_by_isleaf isleaf from v_office a connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = #{dwdm}) where nvl(del_flag,'0') != '1' and type!=4 and type!=2 order by type desc
select * from SYS_MYPAN t connect by prior id=parent_id start with id=#{USERID}
select * from APP_PAN_FILE where MLIDM in (select id from SYS_MYPAN t connect by prior id=parent_id start with id=#{USERID})

select a.*,(select count(1) from app_pan_file where mlidm in (select id from sys_mypan connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = a.id)) anyone1 from (select connect_by_root id rt, connect_by_root name rtname, a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.del_flag, decode(a.parent_id, '0', 1, '') as typpe, decode(a.parent_id, '0', '', 1) as typppe from SYS_MYPAN a connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = #{id}) a where nvl(del_flag,'0') != '1'

select a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.grade, a.address, a.zip_code, a.master, a.phone, a.fax, a.email, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.useable AS useable, p.name AS parent_name FROM SYS_MYPAN a LEFT JOIN SYS_MYPAN p ON p.id = a.parent_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
select * from (select a.*, connect_by_isleaf isleaf from v_mypan a connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = #{id}) where nvl(del_flag,'0') != '1' order by id desc

select a.*,(select count(1) from app_pan_file where mlidm in (select id from sys_mypan connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = a.id)) anyone1 from (select a.* from (select id, parent_id, name,'' xmmc, del_flag, '1' typpe, '' typppe,'' path,'-' scsj,'-' xmid,remarks,'-' xmh,'-' xmlb,'' anyone2 from SYS_MYPAN union all select id, mlidm,'' name, xmmc, isdel, '' typpe, '1' typppe,path,to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') scsj,xmid,remarks,xmh,xmlb,case when trunc(sysdate)-trunc(scsj) <4 then '1' else '' end anyone2 from APP_PAN_FILE) a connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = #{id}) a where nvl(del_flag,'0') != '1' order by typpe,scsj desc

select a.*, decode(a.type, 1, 1, '') as typpe, decode(a.type, 2, 2, '') as typppe, decode(a.type, 3, 3, '') as typpppe FROM v_office a where nvl(a.del_flag, '0') != '1' and a.type != 4 and a.type != 5 and rt=#{dwdm}
select * from v_office a where type!=4 and rt=#{RT} and nvl(a.del_flag, '0') != '1'

select * from APP_PAN_FILE where type='5' and mbid in (select id from v_office where rt=#{RT} and type in ('1','5')) union ALL select * from APP_PAN_FILE where type='5' and mbid in (select id from v_office where id =#{DEPTID})

select a.*,(select count(1) from app_pan_file where mlid in (select id from v_office connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = a.id)) anyone1 from (select a.* from (select id, parent_id, name,'' xmmc, del_flag,type, '1' typpe, '' typppe,'' path,'-' scsj,'-' xmid,remarks,'-' xmh,'-' xmlb,'' anyone2 from V_OFFICE where rt=#{id} union all select id, mlid,'' name, xmmc, isdel,'5' type, '' typpe, '1' typppe,path,to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') scsj,xmid,remarks,xmh,xmlb,case when trunc(sysdate)-trunc(scsj) <4 then '1' else '' end anyone2 from APP_PAN_FILE where mlid in (select id from v_office connect by prior id=parent_id start with id=#{dwdm}) union all select id, mlid,'' name, xmmc, isdel,'5' type, '' typpe, '1' typppe,path,to_char(scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') scsj,xmid,remarks,xmh,xmlb,case when trunc(sysdate)-trunc(scsj) <4 then '1' else '' end anyone2 from APP_PAN_FILE where mlid in (select id from v_office where type=5 and rt=#{id}) ) a connect by prior id = parent_id start with id = #{id}) a where nvl(del_flag,'0') != '1' and type!=4 order by typpe,scsj desc
select * from SYS_OFFICE connect by prior id = PARENT_ID start with length(code) = 8 and type = 2 and substr(code,1,4)=#{CODE} and substr(code, 7, 8) = '03'
